attacks.name: Deadly Poison
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 10 damage plus 40 more damage. If the Defending Pokémon is not Poisoned, that Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Wrap
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
